verses.verse: חֲזוֹן֙ <WH2377> The vision יְשַֽׁעְיָ֣הוּ <WH3470> of Isaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמ֔וֹץ <WH531> of Amoz אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָזָ֔ה <WH2372> which he saw עַל־ <WH5921> concerning יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> concerning Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem בִּימֵ֨י <WH3117> in the days עֻזִּיָּ֧הוּ <WH5818> of Uzziah יוֹתָ֛ם <WH3147> Jotham אָחָ֥ז <WH271> Ahaz יְחִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> Hear שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> O heavens וְהַאֲזִ֣ינִי <WH238> and give ear אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> O earth כִּ֥י <WH3588> For יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD דִּבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> hath spoken בָּנִים֙ <WH1121> children גִּדַּ֣לְתִּי <WH1431> I have nourished וְרוֹמַ֔מְתִּי <WH7311> and brought up וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> they פָּ֥שְׁעוּ <WH6586> and they have rebelled בִֽי׃

יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> knoweth שׁוֹר֙ <WH7794> The ox קֹנֵ֔הוּ <WH7069> his owner וַחֲמ֖וֹר <WH2543> and the ass אֵב֣וּס <WH18> crib בְּעָלָ֑יו <WH1167> his master's יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> [but] Israel לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יָדַ֔ע <WH3045> doth not know עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> my people לֹ֥א <WH3808> not הִתְבּוֹנָֽן׃ <WH995> doth not consider

ה֣וֹי ׀ <WH1945> Ah גּ֣וֹי <WH1471> nation חֹטֵ֗א <WH2398> sinful עַ֚ם <WH5971> a people כֶּ֣בֶד <WH3515> laden עָוֹ֔ן <WH5771> with iniquity זֶ֣רַע <WH2233> a seed מְרֵעִ֔ים <WH7489> of evildoers בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> children מַשְׁחִיתִ֑ים <WH7843> that are corrupters עָזְב֣וּ <WH5800> have abandoned אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD נִֽאֲצ֛וּ <WH5006> unto anger אֶת־ <WH853> קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel נָזֹ֥רוּ <WH2114> they are gone away אָחֽוֹר׃ <WH268> backward

עַ֣ל <WH5921> and מֶ֥ה <WH4100> how long תֻכּ֛וּ <WH5221> Why should ye be stricken ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again תּוֹסִ֣יפוּ <WH3254> more and more סָרָ֑ה <WH5627> any more? ye will revolt כָּל־ <WH3605> and the whole רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> the whole head לָחֳלִ֔י <WH2483> is sick וְכָל־ <WH3605> and the whole לֵבָ֖ב <WH3824> and the whole heart דַּוָּֽי׃ <WH1742> faint

מִכַּף־ <WH3709> From the sole רֶ֤גֶל <WH7272> of the foot וְעַד־ <WH5704> even רֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> even unto the head אֵֽין־ <WH369> There בּ֣וֹ מְתֹ֔ם <WH4974> [there is] no soundness פֶּ֥צַע <WH6482> in it [but] wounds וְחַבּוּרָ֖ה <WH2250> and bruises וּמַכָּ֣ה <WH4347> sores טְרִיָּ֑ה <WH2961> and putrifying לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor זֹ֙רוּ֙ <WH2115> they have not been closed וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor חֻבָּ֔שׁוּ <WH2280> neither bound up וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor רֻכְּכָ֖ה <WH7401> neither mollified בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> with ointment

אַרְצְכֶ֣ם <WH776> Your country שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> [is] desolate עָרֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5892> your cities שְׂרֻפ֣וֹת <WH8313> [are] burned אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> with fire אַדְמַתְכֶ֗ם <WH127> your land לְנֶגְדְּכֶם֙ <WH5048> your presence זָרִים֙ <WH2114> strangers אֹכְלִ֣ים <WH398> devour אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> וּשְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> it in your presence and [it is] desolate כְּמַהְפֵּכַ֥ת <WH4114> as overthrown זָרִֽים׃ <WH2114> by strangers

וְנוֹתְרָ֥ה <WH3498> is left בַת־ <WH1323> And the daughter צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> of Zion כְּסֻכָּ֣ה <WH5521> as a cottage בְכָ֑רֶם <WH3754> in a vineyard כִּמְלוּנָ֥ה <WH4412> as a lodge בְמִקְשָׁ֖ה <WH4750> in a garden of cucumbers כְּעִ֥יר <WH5892> city נְצוּרָֽה׃ <WH5341> as a besieged

לוּלֵי֙ <WH3884> Except יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הוֹתִ֥יר <WH3498> had left לָ֛נוּ שָׂרִ֖יד <WH8300> remnant כִּמְעָ֑ט <WH4592> unto us a very small כִּסְדֹ֣ם <WH5467> as Sodom הָיִ֔ינוּ <WH1961> we should have been לַעֲמֹרָ֖ה <WH6017> unto Gomorrah דָּמִֽינוּ׃ <WH1819> [and] we should have been like ס

שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> Hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God קְצִינֵ֣י <WH7101> ye rulers סְדֹ֑ם <WH5467> of Sodom הַאֲזִ֛ינוּ <WH238> give ear תּוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> unto the law אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> of our God עַ֥ם <WH5971> ye people עֲמֹרָֽה׃ <WH6017> of Gomorrah

לָמָּה־ <WH4100> To what לִּ֤י רֹב־ <WH7230> purpose [is] the multitude זִבְחֵיכֶם֙ <WH2077> of your sacrifices יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> unto me? saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD שָׂבַ֛עְתִּי <WH7646> I am full עֹל֥וֹת <WH5930> of the burnt offerings אֵילִ֖ים <WH352> of rams וְחֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> and the fat מְרִיאִ֑ים <WH4806> of fed beasts וְדַ֨ם <WH1818> not in the blood פָּרִ֧ים <WH6499> of bullocks וּכְבָשִׂ֛ים <WH3532> or of lambs וְעַתּוּדִ֖ים <WH6260> or of he goats לֹ֥א <WH3808> no חָפָֽצְתִּי׃ <WH2654> and I delight

כִּ֣י <WH3588> When תָבֹ֔אוּ <WH935> When ye come לֵרָא֖וֹת <WH7200> to appear פָּנָ֑י <WH6440> before מִי־ <WH4310> Who בִקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> me who hath required זֹ֛את <WH2063> at מִיֶּדְכֶ֖ם <WH3027> this at your hand רְמֹ֥ס <WH7429> to tread חֲצֵרָֽי׃ <WH2691> court

לֹ֣א <WH3808> no תוֹסִ֗יפוּ <WH3254> no more הָבִיא֙ <WH935> Bring מִנְחַת־ <WH4503> oblations שָׁ֔וְא <WH7723> vain קְטֹ֧רֶת <WH7004> incense תּוֹעֵבָ֛ה <WH8441> is an abomination הִ֖יא <WH1931> he לִ֑י חֹ֤דֶשׁ <WH2320> unto me the new moons וְשַׁבָּת֙ <WH7676> and sabbaths קְרֹ֣א <WH7121> the calling מִקְרָ֔א <WH4744> of assemblies לֹא־ <WH3808> no אוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> I cannot away with אָ֖וֶן <WH205> [it is] iniquity וַעֲצָרָֽה׃ <WH6116> even the solemn meeting

חָדְשֵׁיכֶ֤ם <WH2320> Your new moons וּמוֹעֲדֵיכֶם֙ <WH4150> and your appointed feasts שָׂנְאָ֣ה <WH8130> hateth נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> my soul הָי֥וּ <WH1961> have become עָלַ֖י <WH5921> and לָטֹ֑רַח <WH2960> they are a trouble נִלְאֵ֖יתִי <WH3811> unto me I am weary נְשֹֽׂא׃ <WH5375> to bear

וּבְפָרִשְׂכֶ֣ם <WH6566> And when ye spread forth כַּפֵּיכֶ֗ם <WH3709> your hands אַעְלִ֤ים <WH5956> I will hide עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> mine eyes מִכֶּ֔ם <WH4480> at גַּ֛ם <WH1571> Yes כִּֽי־ <WH3588> though תַרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> from you yea when ye make many תְפִלָּ֖ה <WH8605> prayers אֵינֶ֣נִּי <WH369> will not שֹׁמֵ֑עַ <WH8085> I will not hear יְדֵיכֶ֖ם <WH3027> your hands דָּמִ֥ים <WH1818> of blood מָלֵֽאוּ׃ <WH4390> are full

רַחֲצוּ֙ <WH7364> Wash הִזַּכּ֔וּ <WH2135> you make you clean הָסִ֛ירוּ <WH5493> put away רֹ֥עַ <WH7455> the evil מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4611> of your doings מִנֶּ֣גֶד <WH5048> from before עֵינָ֑י <WH5869> mine eyes חִדְל֖וּ <WH2308> cease הָרֵֽעַ׃ <WH7489> to do evil

לִמְד֥וּ <WH3925> Learn הֵיטֵ֛ב <WH3190> to do well דִּרְשׁ֥וּ <WH1875> seek מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> judgment אַשְּׁר֣וּ <WH833> relieve חָמ֑וֹץ <WH2541> the oppressed שִׁפְט֣וּ <WH8199> judge יָת֔וֹם <WH3490> the fatherless רִ֖יבוּ <WH7378> plead אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <WH490> for the widow ס

לְכוּ־ <WH1980> Come נָ֛א <WH4994> now וְנִוָּֽכְחָ֖ה <WH3198> and let us reason together יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD אִם־ <WH518> Though יִֽהְי֨וּ <WH1961> become חֲטָאֵיכֶ֤ם <WH2399> though your sins כַּשָּׁנִים֙ <WH8144> be as scarlet כַּשֶּׁ֣לֶג <WH7950> as snow יַלְבִּ֔ינוּ <WH3835> they shall be as white אִם־ <WH518> Though יַאְדִּ֥ימוּ <WH119> though they be red כַתּוֹלָ֖ע <WH8438> like crimson כַּצֶּ֥מֶר <WH6785> they shall be as wool יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become
אִם־ <WH518> If תֹּאב֖וּ <WH14> If ye be willing וּשְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <WH8085> and obedient ט֥וּב <WH2898> the good הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> ye shall eat

וְאִם־ <WH518> if תְּמָאֲנ֖וּ <WH3985> But if ye refuse וּמְרִיתֶ֑ם <WH4784> and rebel חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> with the sword תְּאֻכְּל֔וּ <WH398> ye shall be devoured כִּ֛י <WH3588> Truly פִּ֥י <WH6310> for the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath spoken ס

אֵיכָה֙ <WH349> how הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> has become לְזוֹנָ֔ה <WH2181> become an harlot קִרְיָ֖ה <WH7151> city נֶאֱמָנָ֑ה <WH539> How is the faithful מְלֵאֲתִ֣י <WH4395> fruit מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> of judgment צֶ֛דֶק <WH6664> righteousness יָלִ֥ין <WH3885> lodged בָּ֖הּ וְעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> now מְרַצְּחִֽים׃ <WH7523> in it but now murderers
כַּסְפֵּ֖ךְ <WH3701> Thy silver הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> has become לְסִיגִ֑ים <WH5509> is become dross סָבְאֵ֖ךְ <WH5435> thy wine מָה֥וּל <WH4107> mixed בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> with water

שָׂרַ֣יִךְ <WH8269> Thy princes סוֹרְרִ֗ים <WH5637> [are] rebellious וְחַבְרֵי֙ <WH2270> and companions גַּנָּבִ֔ים <WH1590> of thieves כֻּלּוֹ֙ <WH3605> Everyone אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> every one loveth שֹׁ֔חַד <WH7810> gifts וְרֹדֵ֖ף <WH7291> and followeth שַׁלְמֹנִ֑ים <WH8021> after rewards יָתוֹם֙ <WH3490> not the fatherless לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִשְׁפֹּ֔טוּ <WH8199> they judge וְרִ֥יב <WH7379> neither doth the cause אַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> of the widow לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יָב֥וֹא <WH935> come אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> before פ

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore נְאֻ֤ם <WH5002> Therefore saith הָֽאָדוֹן֙ <WH113> the Lord יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֲבִ֖יר <WH46> the mighty One יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel ה֚וֹי <WH1945> Ah אֶנָּחֵ֣ם <WH5162> I will ease מִצָּרַ֔י <WH6862> me of mine adversaries וְאִנָּקְמָ֖ה <WH5358> and avenge מֵאוֹיְבָֽי׃ <WH341> me of mine enemies

וְאָשִׁ֤יבָה <WH7725> And I will turn יָדִי֙ <WH3027> my hand עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> against וְאֶצְרֹ֥ף <WH6884> purge away כַּבֹּ֖ר <WH1252> cleanness סִיגָ֑יִךְ <WH5509> thy dross וְאָסִ֖ירָה <WH5493> and take away כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּדִילָֽיִךְ׃ <WH913> all thy tin

וְאָשִׁ֤יבָה <WH7725> And I will restore שֹׁפְטַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH8199> thy judges כְּבָרִ֣אשֹׁנָ֔ה <WH7223> as at the first וְיֹעֲצַ֖יִךְ <WH3289> and thy counsellors כְּבַתְּחִלָּ֑ה <WH8462> as at the beginning אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> afterward כֵ֗ן <WH3651> after that יִקָּ֤רֵא <WH7121> thou shalt be called לָךְ֙ עִ֣יר <WH5892> The city הַצֶּ֔דֶק <WH6664> of righteousness קִרְיָ֖ה <WH7151> city נֶאֱמָנָֽה׃ <WH539> the faithful
צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> Zion בְּמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <WH4941> with judgment תִּפָּדֶ֑ה <WH6299> shall be redeemed וְשָׁבֶ֖יהָ <WH7725> and her converts בִּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> with righteousness

וְשֶׁ֧בֶר <WH7667> And the destruction פֹּשְׁעִ֛ים <WH6586> of the transgressors וְחַטָּאִ֖ים <WH2400> and of the sinners יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> [shall be] together וְעֹזְבֵ֥י <WH5800> and they that forsake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD יִכְלֽוּ׃ <WH3615> shall be consumed

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Surely יֵבֹ֔שׁוּ <WH954> For they shall be ashamed מֵאֵילִ֖ים <WH352> of the oaks אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חֲמַדְתֶּ֑ם <WH2530> which ye have desired וְתַ֨חְפְּר֔וּ <WH2659> and ye shall be confounded מֵהַגַּנּ֖וֹת <WH1593> for the gardens אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בְּחַרְתֶּֽם׃ <WH977> that ye have chosen

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for תִֽהְי֔וּ <WH1961> will be like כְּאֵלָ֖ה <WH424> For ye shall be as an oak נֹבֶ֣לֶת <WH5034> fadeth עָלֶ֑הָ <WH5929> whose leaf וּֽכְגַנָּ֔ה <WH1593> and as a garden אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after מַ֖יִם <WH4325> that hath no water אֵ֥ין <WH369> has לָֽהּ׃

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> will become הֶחָסֹן֙ <WH2634> And the strong לִנְעֹ֔רֶת <WH5296> shall be as tow וּפֹעֲל֖וֹ <WH6467> and the maker לְנִיצ֑וֹץ <WH5213> of it as a spark וּבָעֲר֧וּ <WH1197> burn שְׁנֵיהֶ֛ם <WH8147> and they shall both יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> together וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מְכַבֶּֽה׃ <WH3518> and none shall quench ס
